title: Account hacked
body: my friend account have been hacked so plz can you riot game and is username is ----------- plz can u do some thing for him

replies.body: Have your friend reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as they can! Once they can verify that they were the account creator, the agents should be able to help them get back in the game!
